description: KBITS files are saved in a proprietary format that can only be opened by Bits'N'Picas. The program can also open .SFD , .BDF , .SUIT , .DFONT , FZX, HMZK, DSF, and SBF files. When you are finished modifying your font in a KBITS file, you can export it to a .TTF , BDF, NFNT, SUIT, DFONT, SFONT, RFONT, FZX, HMZK, SBF, or .PNG file.
